creator: maint@intercollab.kiev.ua
text:
I have 4.0.1 version running on RedHat 7.0 and I use access log to get
site statistics. I noticed that access log file is not switching when
new day becomes. All new records are appended to old access log file.

How it could be ?

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
This bug has been fixed about two weeks agp in the CVS, but the fix hasn't been 
picked up by any official release yet.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 4327 ***
